language.title: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the app interface.

apiKey.title: Claude API Key
apiKey.description: An Anthropic API key is required to use AI features.

shortcut.title: Global Shortcut
shortcut.description: Set a shortcut to quickly open and close the app.
shortcut.tabShortcutsDesc: Customize keyboard shortcuts for tab navigation.
shortcut.aiInputDesc: Shortcut to toggle between manual and AI input mode in Today tab.
shortcut.focusInputDesc: Shortcut to focus the task input field in Today tab.

planRules.title: Plan Rules
planRules.description: Set personal rules for AI to reference when analyzing plans or generating tasks.
planRules.example: e.g., "I focus better in the morning", "I prefer light tasks after lunch"
planRules.placeholder: e.g., I prefer to do creative work in the morning...

export.title: Data Export / Import
export.description: Export or import data in Markdown or JSON format.
export.hint: Markdown exports can be used in Obsidian, Notion, etc.
export.importHint: Data will be added to existing data. Duplicates may occur.
